options.explain:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Attack/Movement Speed +4% and Casting Speed +6% per party member
- For parties of 1, a 30% chance of Lightning Explosion on enemies when attacking
options.explainDetail:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Attack/Movement Speed +4% and Casting Speed +6% per party member (Max Stacks: 4)
- For parties of 1, a 30% chance of Lightning Explosion on enemies when attacking (Cooldown: 4 sec. Inflicts 500% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)

options.explain:

options.explain:
Applies the following, depending on the total of Attack Speed options (+/-) on your equipped armor, accessories, and Special Equipment.
- 100 to below 120%: Skill Atk. +10%
- 120 to below 140%: Skill Atk. +20%
- 140% or more: Skill Atk. +30%
options.explainDetail:
Applies the following, depending on the total of Attack Speed options (+/-) on your equipped armor, accessories, and Special Equipment. (Avatars, emblems, gems, Creatures, and titles included)
- 100 to below 120%: Skill Atk. +10%
- 120 to below 140%: Skill Atk. +20%
- 140% or more: Skill Atk. +30%

Consumes 99% of HP and restricts 99% of max usable HP upon entering dungeons. (HP can't be restored past this restriction.)
Incoming damage consumes MP before HP.
